annotation.message: An operand identifier [reference] is hiding another identifier of the same name.
An operand identifier [reference] is hiding another identifier of the same name.
An operand identifier [reference] is hiding another identifier of the same name.

a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD2DTPolioSequentialLogic (IMMZ.D2.DT.Polio.Sequential IPV–bOPV) * Rule: Determine if the client is due for a poliovirus vaccination according to the national immunization schedule * Decision Table: Sequential "Bivalent oral polio vaccine (bOPV)–inactivated polio vaccine (IPV)" schedule (in countries with high vaccination coverage [e.g. 90–95%] and low importation risk [where neighbouring countries and/or countries that share substantial population movement have a similarly high coverage]) * Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any */ library IMMZD2DTPolioSequentialLogic

def.name: Today
Patient
Patient
Client is not due for IPV vaccination Case 1

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for IPV vaccination Case 1

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

a:s.a:s: "No poliovirus primary series doses were administered"

operand.name: No poliovirus primary series doses were administered
Client's age is less than 8 weeks

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for IPV vaccination Case 2

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

a:s.a:s: "One poliovirus primary series dose was administered"
"The latest poliovirus dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago"

"Client is not due for IPV vaccination Case 2"

Client is not due for IPV vaccination Case 2

def.name: Client is not due for IPV vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for IPV vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with first IPV dose as client's age is less than 8 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first poliovirus dose.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with second IPV dose as the latest IPV dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for IPV vaccination Case 1"
'Should not vaccinate client with first IPV dose as client\'s age is less than 8 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first poliovirus dose.'
"Client is not due for IPV vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client with second IPV dose as the latest IPV dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.'

when.name: Client is not due for IPV vaccination Case 1

then.value: Should not vaccinate client with first IPV dose as client's age is less than 8 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first poliovirus dose.

when.name: Client is not due for IPV vaccination Case 2

then.value: Should not vaccinate client with second IPV dose as the latest IPV dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.

"Client's age is more than or equal to 8 weeks"

def.name: Client is due for IPV vaccination Guidance

a:t.value: Client is due for IPV vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should vaccinate client with first IPV dose as client is within appropriate age range and IPV dose was not administered. Check for contraindications.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should vaccinate client with second IPV dose as the latest IPV dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.

a:s.a:s: "Client is due for IPV vaccination Case 1"
'Should vaccinate client with first IPV dose as client is within appropriate age range and IPV dose was not administered. Check for contraindications.'

'Should vaccinate client with second IPV dose as the latest IPV dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'

a:t.value: Primary series is complete

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed"

def.name: Primary series is complete Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Primary series is complete Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Poliovirus primary series is complete. Assess if supplementary bOPV dose(s) are necessary and create a clinical note. Check for any other vaccines due.

a:s.a:s: 'Poliovirus primary series is complete. Assess if supplementary bOPV dose(s) are necessary and create a clinical note. Check for any other vaccines due.'

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for IPV vaccination Case 1"
'Should not vaccinate client with first IPV dose as client\'s age is less than 8 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first poliovirus dose.'
"Client is due for IPV vaccination Case 1"
'Should vaccinate client with first IPV dose as client is within appropriate age range and IPV dose was not administered. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is not due for IPV vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client with second IPV dose as the latest IPV dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.'

'Should vaccinate client with second IPV dose as the latest IPV dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'

'Should vaccinate client with first bOPV dose as two IPV doses were administered. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is not due for bOPV vaccination"

"Client is due for bOPV vaccination Case 2"
'Should vaccinate client with second bOPV dose as the latest bOPV dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
'Poliovirus primary series is complete. Assess if supplementary bOPV dose(s) are necessary and create a clinical note. Check for any other vaccines due.'
